name: Qr generator
description: A Qr Code Generator built using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and integrated with API calls to dynamically generate QR codes for any link you provide!

name: BMI calculator
description: Understanding BMI is essential for tracking personal health, and I wanted to create a tool that's not only accurate and fast but also responsive across devices.

name: Password generator
description: Random Password Generator is a simple and responsive web application built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS. It allows users to generate secure, customizable passwords instantly.
